sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ProductBox :books="books"/>
</template>

<script>

import ProductBox from '@/components/ProductBox.vue'

export default
{
    name: "Search",

    components: 
    { 
      ProductBox
    },
    
    data(){

        return{ books: null }

    },
    
    update(){
        
        this.books = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("searchResult"))
        this.$forceUpdate();

    }
    

}

</script>
